name: Moding with pahimar
body:
***
# Welcome to my mod with @pahimar
I've got my entire repository saved here with commits for each episode. All you need to do is download the file and add it as a project to [IntelliJ IDEA](http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/) or your favorite editor.

***

### @pahimar 

Here are the links to @pahimar's modding tutorial

* [Let's Mod Reboot - Minecraft 1.7](http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQPiZYWovwmnZlgvbHCbz6TefIgeEiVcj)

* [Ep. 4 (it's missing from the playlist)](http://youtu.be/KchpGhnH5wg)

***

### Authors and Contributors
All credit goes to @pahimar and his patrons for there awesome support and his excellent tutorial
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
